definition[0]: tax paid on the money that you earn
definition[1]: in Britain, a tax on money people earn, paid to the national government. In the US, a tax on the money people earn or on the profits companies make, paid to the national, state, or local government
example[0]: Florida and Texas have no income tax, which is one reason that many people with substantial assets live there.
example[1]: He failed to report and pay income tax on his portion of this income.
